Package com.example.Coding_Challenge.Services

Class DocumentService

java.lang.Object
com.example.Coding_Challenge.Services.DocumentService
@Service public class DocumentService extends Object
The UserService class handles all logic for the User table.

  • Method Details

    • createDocument

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createDocument(String user_name, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, String type)
      The function createDocument uploads a file and creates a Document in the database.
      Parameters:
      user_name - A String that contains a user_name.
      file - A MultipartFile that contains the file that will be saved.
      type - A string that contains the Document type.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity that indicates if the Document was uploaded and saved correctly.

    • getDocumentsForUser

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getDocumentsForUser(String user_name)
      The function getDocumentsForUser collects all documents for a certain user.
      Parameters:
      user_name - A string that contains a username.

      The function fileUpload uploads a file to the server.
      Parameters:
      file - A MultipartFile that contains the file that will be saved.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity that indicates if the file was saved correctly.
      Throws:
      IOException

      The function downloadDocument Downloads a saved Document.
      Parameters:
      user_name - A string that contains a users name.
      document_name - A string that contains a Document name.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity that indicates if the Document was downloaded correctly.

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateDocument(String user_name, String document_name, String type)
      The function updateDocument updates Document info.
      Parameters:
      user_name - A String that contains a users name.
      document_name - A String that contains a Document name.
      type - A String that contains the Document type.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity that describes if the Document was updated correctly.
